comment: ! I hope no one has gotten the flu like I did . Stay home and people ; it's sick out there ! And these brilliant
amr:
# ::snt ! I hope no one has gotten the flu like I did . Stay home and people ; it's sick out there ! And these brilliant
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hope-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 (n / no-one)
                  :ARG1 (d / disease
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "influenza"))
                  :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                        :ARG2 (g2 / get-01
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 d))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (s / stay-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG1 (y / you)
                  :ARG3 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (h2 / home)
                        :op2 (p / person))
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (s2 / sick-05
                              :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
                              :location (o / out-there))))
            :op2 (b / brilliant-01
                  :ARG1 (t / this))))
